name: Invader War 2
description:
Long, long ago in a galaxy far, far away….

After beating one of Halues' machines, Leo (the pilot of the player's ship) and the other members has found themselves in a much more difficult situation: The Halues is now planning a revenge, and it is now being carried out! However, Leo arrives too late to stop the capture of their base. Could he rescue his team members from Halues' grasp and recover the missing crystal, or is the universe gone forever?

- Travel across the universe in search of his secret base! (chapter 1, out now!)

Future chapters will come in the future updates of this game!

Happy blasting!

★ Invader War was originally written by Lim Ding Wen (the author of Doodle Kids) for the Apple IIGS computer when he was 8.

★ Special thanks!
To Mr Brendan Robert for the excellent music!

★ About Lim Ding Wen
http://dingwen.virtual-gs.com
